answers.answer: I was a vegetarian for years and hadn't eaten pork since I was 8 years old. I got pregnant in 2011  with my second baby and a week before I found out I caught myself eating corn dogs!

I went nuts in my first trimester with eating whatever I wanted. I had tone it down a bit because I was putting on too much weight. I now try to eat as healthy as possible an allow myself a "junk food" day once a week. I just don't want to end up with gestational diabetes. Don't get me wrong, if I crave something, I eat it. I just try to eat in moderation.
So i should slow down than? im not in my second trimester yet so by then i should be cutting back? its hard because all the healthy foods make me sick, i want to eat better for my baby tho!
I ate pretty healthy up till a month ago.. its been downhill since then and I'm due in 3 weeks lol I.hope my baby doesn't swell up

Eat what you can if it doesn't make you sick. Have you started prenatal vitamins?? I personally just changed how I ate after my first trimester because I no longer got sick and was scared of gaining so much.
yeah i have been taking the vitamins since week 5. And i want to eat way more healthy in the second trimester since its almost the end of my 1st.

question: So when i first found out i was pregnant i was eating super healthy and doing so good, But now for about 3 weeks ive been eating alot of fatty junk food. Its weird because when i eat healthy foods i throw up more then when i eat junk food. Do you think im eating too unhealthy and will it effect the baby??
title: junk food!!!!
